original_text: Then another horse came out. This horse was bright red, like fire. The person who was riding the horse had authority. He could take peace away from the earth, so that people killed each other. Someone gave him a large sword.
korean_text: 이에 다른 붉은 말이 나오더라 그 탄 자가 허락을 받아 땅에서 화평을 제하여 버리며 서로 죽이게 하고 또 큰 칼을 받았더라

sentences.original_text: This horse was bright red, like fire.
The person who was riding the horse had authority.
He could take peace away from the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 땅에서 평화를 없앨 수 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: so that people killed each other.
Someone gave him a large sword.
